thread.title: Kern & Hammerstein's Show Boat Live From Lincoln Center
thread.title_full: Video: Kern & Hammerstein's Show Boat | Watch Live From Lincoln Center Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Kern & Hammerstein's Show Boat Live From Lincoln Center
text: The landmark musical brought vividly to life by the New York Philharmonic, with an all-star cast led by Vanessa Williams, Julian Ovenden, Lauren Worsham, Norm Lewis, Jane Alexander and Fred Willard.
